title.rendered: Alticor Inc Board of Directors Announces Promotion

content.rendered:
The Alticor Inc Board of Directors is proud to announce the promotion of Michael (Mike) J. Choutka.

Michael (Mike) J. Choutka has been promoted to President of Alticor Inc Construction Co. with overall responsibility for the operational leadership of the organization. Mike will retain his current responsibilities as the Chief Operating Officer (COO). He will maintain an office in Greeley, Colorado, and will travel extensively between district offices.

Jeffrey (Jeff) K. Wenaas will retain the position of Chief Executive Officer (CEO) with overall responsibility for the strategic vision of the organization.

To learn more about Mike and the Alticor Inc executive team, visit our Leadership page.
